on save adapter restarts with new config: no adaptador de salvar reinicia com nova configuração imediatamente
ip: IP adress of the LG WebOS TV
mac: MAC adress of the LG WebOS TV
power: Turn off the TV as a remote control button
customwolip: Usar IP Wake-On-LAN personalizado. Isso pode ser necessário para transmissões direcionadas por sub-rede (SDBs).
help_tip: At first connection from ioBroker to your TV you must allow this connection on your TV screen.
